Ebe American Brass Superfund bụ ebe ụlọ ọrụ mmepụta ihe, nke dị na Henry County, Alabama

(ABI) na-arụ ọrụ na ebe a na-agbaze ọla na ebe a n'etiti afọ 1978 na 1992. Tupu mmechi ya na Disemba 1992, ụlọ ọrụ ahụ kwuru na United States Environmental Protection Agency (EPA), na Ngalaba Alabama nke Environmental Management, (ADEM), n'ọtụtụ oge maka mmebi iwu Resource Conservation and Recovery Act (RCRA), nke sitere na ihe mkpofu ya na usoro mkpofu dị ize ndụ. Nnyocha saịtị, nke ADEM mere mgbe ABI kwụsịrị ịrụ ọrụ, kpughee nkwakọba ihe mkpofu ruru puku tọn 150,000, yana nnukwu mmetọ ala na mmiri dị n'ime ala.
Mgbe nyocha nke EPA gasịrị, agbakwunyere ya na Ndepụta Ihe Ndị Na-ebute ụzọ na Mba, na Mee 1999, maka usoro mgbazi ogologo oge.
